mapper.select: SELECT c.class_no, c.class_name, c.description, c.field_code, c.division_code, c.level_code, c.min_capacity, c.max_capacity, c.instructor_no, e.name AS instructor_name FROM class c LEFT JOIN instructor i ON c.instructor_no = i.instructor_no LEFT JOIN employee e ON i.user_no = e.user_no ORDER BY c.class_no DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{pageSize}
SELECT count(c.class_no) FROM class c LEFT JOIN instructor i ON c.instructor_no = i.instructor_no LEFT JOIN employee e ON i.user_no = e.user_no

SELECT c.class_no, c.class_name, c.description, c.field_code, c.division_code, c.level_code, c.min_capacity, c.max_capacity, c.instructor_no, c.price, e.name AS instructor_name FROM class c LEFT JOIN instructor i ON c.instructor_no = i.instructor_no LEFT JOIN employee e ON i.user_no = e.user_no WHERE c.class_no = #{classNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO class (class_name, description, field_code, division_code, level_code, min_capacity, max_capacity, instructor_no) VALUES (#{className}, #{description}, #{fieldCode}, #{divisionCode}, #{levelCode}, #{minCapacity}, #{maxCapacity}, #{instructorNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE class SET class_name = #{className}, description = #{description}, field_code = #{fieldCode}, division_code = #{divisionCode}, level_code = #{levelCode}, min_capacity = #{minCapacity}, max_capacity = #{maxCapacity}, instructor_no = #{instructorNo} WHERE class_no = #{classNo}
